name: name

theme.name: theme
theme.description: auto theme switches between light and dark themes depending on your device's display mode

language.name: language
language.description: any text that isn't translated will be displayed in english

port.name: port
port.description: ports 389 and 636 are used for ldap connection, with 389 being unencrypted and 636 encrypted

dn.name: service account dn
dn.description: service account used for binding to the LDAP server

search-filter.name: user search filter
search-filter.description: the filter used to search for users in the LDAP directory. use {0} as a placeholder for the username.

map-groups-to-courses.name: map ad groups to courses and tags
map-groups-to-courses.description: allows you to map active directory (ad) groups to specific courses and tags

preview-page-size.name: preview page size
preview-page-size.description: number of items per page for preview

view-private-settings.name: view private settings
view-private-settings.description: allows the user to view confidential system settings.

edit-private-settings.name: edit private settings
edit-private-settings.description: allows the user to modify confidential system settings.

manage-permissions.name: manage permissions
manage-permissions.description: allows the user to assign and modify permissions for other users.

view-all-courses.name: view all courses
view-all-courses.description: allows the user to view all courses in the system.

view-assigned-courses.name: view assigned courses
view-assigned-courses.description: allows the user to view only the courses they are assigned to.

edit-assigned-courses.name: edit assigned courses
edit-assigned-courses.description: allows the user to edit courses they are assigned to.

edit-all-courses.name: edit all courses
edit-all-courses.description: allows the user to edit any course in the system.

delete-all-courses.name: delete any course
delete-all-courses.description: allows the user to delete any course in the system.

delete-assigned-course.name: delete assigned course
delete-assigned-course.description: allows the user to delete only courses they are assigned to.

create-course.name: create course
create-course.description: allows the user to create new courses.

view-own-stats.name: view own statistics
view-own-stats.description: allows the user to view their own course statistics.

view-assigned-stats.name: view assigned statistics
view-assigned-stats.description: allows the user to view statistics for courses they are assigned to.

view-all-stats.name: view all statistics
view-all-stats.description: allows the user to view statistics for all courses in the system.

manage-users.name: manage users
manage-users.description: allows adding, editing, and deleting users.

view-tags.name: view tags
view-tags.description: allows the user to view tags.

manage-tags.name: manage tags
manage-tags.description: allows the user to create, edit and delete tags.

manage-roles.name: manage roles
manage-roles.description: allows creating, editing, and deleting roles.

manage-moderators.name: manage moderators
manage-moderators.description: allows assigning and removing course moderators.

manage-owners.name: manage owners
manage-owners.description: allows assigning and removing course owners.

manage-subscribers.name: manage course subscribers
manage-subscribers.description: allows adding and removing course subscribers.

courses-hub.name: courses hub
courses-hub.creator: creator

editors.name: editors
editors.no-users-for-editors: no users found to assign as editors

sections.name: sections
sections.title: section

isVisible.name: is visible
isVisible.description: invisible section is not shown in the course, but can be seen by course editors

sections.delete-description: be careful! when a section is deleted, all lessons and materials in it are also deleted

time.name: lesson reading/watching time
time.description: can be detected in automatically by video if exists

upload-video.name: upload video
upload-video.description: you can upload video with size less than {{size}}

generate-synopsis.name: generate synopsis
generate-synopsis.description: synopsis is generated from video, and you can change it later, including with the help of artificial intelligence and markdown formatting

generate-survey.name: generate survey
generate-survey.description: survey is generated from synopsis and video, and you can change it later

what-else.name: what else can be uploaded?
what-else.description: you can upload <u>presentations</u>, <u>practical tasks</u>, <u>links</u> and other stuff

you-can-add-video-later.name: you can add video later if you want

courses-hub.delete-description: be careful! when a course is deleted, all materials in it are also deleted

title-length.name: title length
title-length.description: length of names of entities in the courses hub in the format (min, max)
title-length.error: name must be longer than {{min}} characters and shorter than {{max}} characters

title-regex.name: title regex
title-regex.description: regex for names of entities in the courses hub

sidebar.no-users-for-subscribers: no users found to assign as course subscribers

size.name: maximum file size
size.description: set -1 to remove the file size limit
size.error: the file size must be less than {{size}}

link-restrictions.name: link restrictions
link-restrictions.description: list domains that cannot be linked

file-must-be-one-of-types: the file must be one of the following types:

video-upload.placeholder: drag and drop or select a file
